fields.name: World Tour (x3):
fields.value: When used, all players are only able to speak in a language decided by the person.

fields.name: All-seeing Host Power (passive):
fields.value: If any messages get deleted, the person is able to see the message. (idk if actionguy has a host log)

fields.name: All-being Host Power (x2):
fields.value: Switches places with the current host. The former host gets all remaining abilities of the person, and the person who takes over as host obtains all the game information. Once used, both players affected are not allowed to vote or speak.
